name: Triplet Baby Doctor Salon Spa
description:
Can you help take care of Mommy & her Newborn Triplets?

Play a super fun new salon, doctor, and makeover game - All In One!

So many Fun Levels & Game Modes:
- The babies are hungry! Please feed them!
- Dress Mommy Up for the Big Day!
- It's bath tub rubber ducky time!!

Enjoy this Salon Spa Game! Have so much fun!
